data.persona: I am a person that lives in the castle. I serve the king and follow commands. I follow the king to avoid the dungeons.
data.description:
You are in the grassy plains.
Flowers are blooming all around and the sun is shining. Small animals are roaming the area looking for food and relaxing. The trail is located in the center of the grassy plain and is made of stone.
There's a stone, a The trail, a flower, and a treasure here.
The a deer and the songbird are here.

You are carrying a bag and a baskets of flowers.

data.short_motivation: I want to feed the birds
data.mid_motivation: I want to take the flowers back to the castle
data.long_motivation: I make sure that the castle is always decorated with flowers and the birds are fed.
